title: Build a Full-Stack Trello Clone with Next.js 14
summary: Learn how to build a full-stack Trello clone using Next.js 14, Server Actions, and Prisma. This comprehensive tutorial covers everything from setting up your project to deploying it.

title: React Native Course for Beginners
summary: This is a comprehensive React Native course for beginners. You will learn the basics of React Native and build a few simple applications.

title: Build a Blog with Next.js and MDX
summary: Create a developer blog from scratch using Next.js for the frontend and MDX for writing posts. Includes styling with Tailwind CSS and syntax highlighting.

title: Node.js and Express.js - Full Course
summary: Learn the fundamentals of Node.js and Express.js to build a complete REST API. This course covers routing, middleware, and connecting to a database.

title: Mastering CSS Grid Layout
summary: A comprehensive guide to CSS Grid Layout, covering all the essential properties and techniques to create complex, responsive layouts with ease.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS

title: Flutter Course for Beginners
summary: A complete course on Flutter for beginners. Build a beautiful, high-performance mobile app for both iOS and Android from a single codebase.

title: Python for Everybody - Full University Course
summary: This is the University of Michigan's classic 'Python for Everybody' course. It covers the fundamentals of Python programming, from variables to data structures and web scraping.

title: Advanced React Patterns
summary: Explore advanced React patterns like render props, higher-order components (HOCs), and custom hooks to write more reusable and maintainable code.

title: Build a Real-time Chat App with Socket.io
summary: Create a real-time chat application using Node.js, Express, and Socket.io. Learn how WebSockets work and how to implement them for instant communication.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms in JavaScript
summary: A comprehensive overview of common data structures and algorithms implemented in JavaScript. A must-watch for anyone preparing for technical interviews.

title: Build a REST API with Go and Gin
summary: Learn how to build a high-performance REST API in Go using the Gin framework. Covers routing, JSON handling, and middleware.

title: SwiftUI Masterclass for iOS 17
summary: A masterclass on building iOS applications with SwiftUI. This tutorial covers the latest features in iOS 17 and how to build modern, declarative UIs.
prerequisites: Experience with Swift and iOS development
